footnotes = }} Shimada is a city in Shizuoka Prefecture, Japan. It is on the island of Honshū. ==Geography== Shimada is on the Shida Plain. Several rivers pass through Shimada including the Tochiyama River and the Õi River. ==Sister cities== * Himi, Toyama, Japan, from April 15, 1987 * Huzhou, Zhejiang, China, from May 1987 * Brienz, Switzerland, from August 10, 1986 * Richmond, California, USA, from December 1961. Shimada and Richmond have a student exchange program. ==People from Shimada== * Yuki Iwata (岩田 ユキ) - movie director ==Other websites== Category:Cities in Shizuoka Prefecture
title: Shimada, Shizuoka
